div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2353 Ollioules, 5 km. W of Toulon, 1958 Burial: c. 470-460 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 24 AR Unc. Ionian (inc. Massalia ?): 24 AR (types similar to those of Auriol) Disposition: unknown Holland, BSFN 1959, pp. 262-4 Layet-Huguenin, Annales de la Société des sciences naturelles et d'Archéologie de Toulon et du Var 14 (1962), pp. 39-68
